publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-315 Mr Tom McCabe (Hamilton South) (Lab) on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: That the Parliament agrees the following programme of business— Wednesday 1 December 1999 2.30 pm Time for Reflection followed by Parliamentary Bureau Motions followed by Stage 3 Debate on the Public Finance and Accountability (Scotland) Bill 5.00 pm Decision Time followed by Members' Business debate on the subject of S1M-238, Cathy Jamieson: Co-operative and Mutual Sector in Scotland Thursday 2 December 1999 9.30 am Debate on a motion by the Scottish National Party followed by Business Motion followed by Parliamentary Bureau Motions 2.30 pm Question Time 3.00 pm Open Question Time followed by, no later than 3.15 pm Debate on an Executive motion on Equalities 5.00 pm Decision Time followed by Members' Business debate on the subject of S1M-287, Bruce Crawford: European Freight and Passenger Terminal In Fife Wednesday 8 December 1999 2.30 pm Time for Reflection followed by Ministerial Statement on Local Government Finance followed by Debate on Executive Motion on Sea Fisheries followed by Parliamentary Bureau motions 5.00 pm Decision Time followed by Members' Business Thursday 9 December 1999 9.30 am Stage 1 Debate on Adults with Incapacity (Scotland) Bill followed by Business Motion followed by Parliamentary Bureau motions 2.30 pm Question Time 3.00 pm Open Question Time followed by, no later than 3.15 pm Ministerial Statement followed by, no later than 3.45 pm Debate on a Report by the Procedures Committee 5.00 pm Decision Time followed by Members' Business
